title

201

subTitle



Request/Response wire representation

# Payload
1 
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: two
User-Agent: Go-http-client/1.1
Content-Length: 20
Accept-Encoding: gzip


{
    "email": "a@b.com"
}
2 
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: three
User-Agent: Go-http-client/1.1
Content-Length: 23
Accept-Encoding: gzip


{
    "username": "a@b.com"
}
3 
HTTP/0.0 200 OK
Content-Length: 0
4 
HTTP/0.0 201 Created
Content-Length: 0
